name: Google MQTT Publish
description: An application based on Google* Cloud IoT Core for publishing a single message. See the README.md file in the GitHub repo for this project before continuing.
service_provider_description: A fully managed service to easily and securely connect, manage, and ingest data from globally dispersed devices

additional_fields.name: Private EC Key File Path
additional_fields.description: Full Path to Private EC Key File, e.g. /etc/google-cloud-keys/ec_private.pem

additional_fields.name: roots.pem file path
additional_fields.description: Full Path to roots.pem File, e.g. /etc/google-cloud-keys/roots.pem
